TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ClaimTypes extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the pre-defined types of claims that an entity can claim. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the ClaimTypes class to search for a particular type of claim in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> or to create a claim. To search for a particular type of claim in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.FindClaims%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> method and use the properties of this class to specify the claim type for the `claimType` parameter. When the constructor for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> class is used to create a new claim, use the properties of the ClaimTypes class to specify the `claimType` parameter. For many of the claim types, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> class has static properties that return a claim of a specific type. For instance, the [CreateHashClaim(Byte\[\])](assetId:///M:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.CreateHashClaim(System.Byte[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) method returns a claim using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Hash%2A> claim type.
## Examples [!code-vb[c_ClaimTypes#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.identitymodel.c_3_1.vb)] [!code-cs[c_ClaimTypes#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.identitymodel.c_3_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authentication.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the country/region in which an entity resides.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a country/region in which an entity resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only security identifier (SID) for an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only SID for an entity.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.
The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the email address of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the email address of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the gender of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the gender of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/gender.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the given name of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the given name of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a hash value.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a hash value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/hash.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the home phone number of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the home phone number of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/homephone.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the locale in which an entity resides.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the locale in which an entity resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/locality.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the mobile phone number of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the mobile phone number of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/mobilephone.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/name.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/nameidentifier.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the alternative phone number of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the alternative phone number of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/otherphone.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the postal code of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the postal code of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/postalcode.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the private personal identifier (PPI) of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the private personal identifier (PPI) of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/privatepersonalidentifier.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies an RSA key.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies an RSA key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/rsa.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a security identifier (SID).
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a security identifier (SID).

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/sid.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a service principal name (SPN) claim.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a service principal name (SPN) claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/spn.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the state or province in which an entity resides.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the state or province in which an entity resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/stateorprovince.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the street address of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the street address of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/streetaddress.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the surname of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the surname of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/surname.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The System is typically used to identify the issuer of a claim when the issuer is the current application.
The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A thumbprint is a globally unique SHA-1 hash of an X.509 certificate.
The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a user principal name (UPN).
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies UPN.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/upn.
## Examples // \<snippet1>

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a URI.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/uri.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the Web page of an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the Web page of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/webpage.

Docs.summary: Gets the string that contains the URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.
Docs.value: The URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The X.500 standard defines the methodology for defining distinguished names that is used by X.509 certificates.
